changeSet.author: jhipster
changeSet.createView: select DISTINCT a.frozen_box_code,a.id,a.sample_type_name,a.status,a.memo,a.project_code,a.project_name,0 as count_of_sample, (a.equipment_code||'.'||a.area_code||'.'||a.support_rack_code ||'.'||a.columns_in_shelf || lpad(a.rows_in_shelf,2,0)) as position, sc.sample_classification_name,e.stock_out_task_id from frozen_box a left join project_sample sc on a.sample_classification_id=sc.sample_classification_id and a.sample_type_id = sc.sample_type_id and a.project_id = sc.project_id left join stock_out_req_frozen_tube c on c.frozen_box_id = a.id left join stock_out_plan_tube b on b.stock_out_req_frozen_tube_id =c.id left join stock_out_task_tube e on e.stock_out_plan_frozen_tube_id =b.id
